languages.text: {n}На мостике повисает мертвая тишина, порожденная звонким ударом, но длится она всего миг. Офицеры немедленно возвращаются к своим делам, не рискуя привлечь к себе ваше внимание.{/n}
{n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мостике повисает мертвая тишина, порожденная звонким ударом, но длится она всего миг. Офицеры немедленно возвращаются к своим делам, не рискуя привлечь к себе ваше внимание.{/n}

{n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}大きな音のあと、ブリッジには死のような静寂が訪れた。だが、それはほんの一瞬のことだった。士官たちはあなたの注意を引くのを恐れ、慌てて持ち場に戻っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大きな音のあと、ブリッジには死のような静寂が訪れた。だが、それはほんの一瞬のことだった。士官たちはあなたの注意を引くのを恐れ、慌てて持ち場に戻っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Totenstille legt sich über die Brücke, wie nach einem lauten Geräusch, aber sie dauert nur einen Augenblick. Die Offiziere eilen zurück zu ihren Pflichten, voller Angst, deine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Totenstille legt sich über die Brücke, wie nach einem lauten Geräusch, aber sie dauert nur einen Augenblick. Die Offiziere eilen zurück zu ihren Pflichten, voller Angst, deine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le claquement sonore résonne à travers la passerelle avant de laisser place à un silence pesant, mais bref. Les officiers se replongent dans leur tâche en toute hâte, souhaitant à tout prix éviter d'attirer votre attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le claquement sonore résonne à travers la passerelle avant de laisser place à un silence pesant, mais bref. Les officiers se replongent dans leur tâche en toute hâte, souhaitant à tout prix éviter d'attirer votre attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras el fuerte estrépito se hace un silencio sepulcral en el puente, pero solo dura un instante. Los oficiales regresan apresuradamente a sus quehaceres por temor a llamar tu atención.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras el fuerte estrépito se hace un silencio sepulcral en el puente, pero solo dura un instante. Los oficiales regresan apresuradamente a sus quehaceres por temor a llamar tu atención.{/n}

languages.text: {n}响亮的耳光声过后，舰桥上一片死寂，但沉默只持续了一会儿。所有军官急匆匆地返回了各自的岗位，生怕引起你的注意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}响亮的耳光声过后，舰桥上一片死寂，但沉默只持续了一会儿。所有军官急匆匆地返回了各自的岗位，生怕引起你的注意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gürültünün ardından köprüye bir ölüm sessizliği çöküyor ama sessizlik yalnızca bir an sürüyor. Dikkatini çekmekten korkan subaylar, aceleyle görevlerine dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Dead silence falls over the bridge in the wake of the loud noise, but it lasts only a moment. The officers hurry to return to their duties for fear of drawing your attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gürültünün ardından köprüye bir ölüm sessizliği çöküyor ama sessizlik yalnızca bir an sürüyor. Subaylar dikkatini çekmek korkusuyla görevlerine aceleyle dönüyorlar.{/n}
